name: Home Wreckers
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Chris Harris, Robia Rashid (executive story editor), Matt Kuhn (story)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Ted reacts to his mom's second wedding by making the capricious decision to buy his "dream house," while everyone tries to figure out whether Barney or Robin cried at the wedding.
